languages.text: {n}Marazhai's barely audible footsteps seem to drown out all other sounds on the bridge. Officers break away from their tasks and cast fearful and hateful glances in his direction. Marazhai seems to be revelling in the outpouring of hostile attention, a satisfied smile playing on his lips. But when he glances at you, he drops to one knee and bows his head submissively.{/n} "{name}. I seek your permission."
languages.original_text: {n}Едва слышные шаги Маражая, кажется, гасят все звуки вокруг: офицеры отрываются от работы и провожают ксеноса взглядами, полными страха и ненависти. Друкари, кажется, купается в волнах озлобленного внимания, на его губах играет довольная улыбка. Однако стоит ему бросить взгляд на вас, как он покорно опускается на одно колено и склоняет голову.{/n} "{name}. Я обращаюсь к тебе за дозволением".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's barely audible footsteps seem to drown out all other sounds on the bridge. Officers break away from their tasks and cast fearful and hateful glances in his direction. Marazhai seems to be revelling in the outpouring of hostile attention, a satisfied smile playing on his lips. But when he glances at you, he drops to one knee and bows his head submissively.{/n} "{name}. I seek your permission."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Едва слышные шаги Маражая, кажется, гасят все звуки вокруг: офицеры отрываются от работы и провожают ксеноса взглядами, полными страха и ненависти. Друкари, кажется, купается в волнах озлобленного внимания, на его губах играет довольная улыбка. Однако стоит ему бросить взгляд на вас, как он покорно опускается на одно колено и склоняет голову.{/n} "{name}. Я обращаюсь к тебе за дозволением".
{n}玛拉斋安静的脚步声似乎盖过了舰桥上的一切喧嚣。军官们放下手中的工作，朝他投去恐惧与仇恨的目光。玛拉斋似乎非常享受沐浴在这种公开的敌意之中的感觉，唇边漾出一丝满意的笑容。看到你之后，他单膝跪地，恭敬地低下了头。{/n}“{name}，我恳求你的允许。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's barely audible footsteps seem to drown out all other sounds on the bridge. Officers break away from their tasks and cast fearful and hateful glances in his direction. Marazhai seems to be revelling in the outpouring of hostile attention, a satisfied smile playing on his lips. But when he glances at you, he drops to one knee and bows his head submissively.{/n} "{name}. I seek your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋安静的脚步声似乎盖过了舰桥上的一切喧嚣。军官们放下手中的工作，朝他投去恐惧与仇恨的目光。玛拉斋似乎非常享受沐浴在这种公开的敌意之中的感觉，唇边漾出一丝满意的笑容。看到你之后，他单膝跪地，恭敬地低下了头。{/n}“{name}，我恳求你的允许。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las pisadas apenas audibles de Marazhai se imponen a todos los demás sonidos del puente. Los oficiales dejan lo que están haciendo y lanzan miradas de miedo y desprecio en su dirección. Marazhai parece disfrutar con la efusión de hostilidad y se pasea con una sonrisa de satisfacción en los labios. Pero cuando su mirada se posa en ti, se hinca sobre una rodilla e inclina la cabeza a modo de sumisión.{/n} «{name}. Dame tu permiso».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's barely audible footsteps seem to drown out all other sounds on the bridge. Officers break away from their tasks and cast fearful and hateful glances in his direction. Marazhai seems to be revelling in the outpouring of hostile attention, a satisfied smile playing on his lips. But when he glances at you, he drops to one knee and bows his head submissively.{/n} "{name}. I seek your permission."

Los oficiales dejan lo que están haciendo y lanzan miradas de miedo y desprecio en su dirección. Marazhai parece disfrutar con la efusión de hostilidad y se pasea con una sonrisa de satisfacción en los labios. Pero cuando su mirada se posa en ti, se hinca sobre una rodilla e inclina la cabeza a modo de sumisión.{/n} «{name}. Dame tu permiso».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les pas quasiment inaudibles de Marazhai semblent pourtant étouffer tous les autres sons qui résonnent habituellement sur le pont. Les officiers s'interrompent dans leur travail et lui lancent des regards où se mêlent terreur et haine. Marazhai semble se délecter de leur hostilité et affiche un sourire satisfait, mais quand il vous aperçoit, il met un genou à terre et s'incline avec déférence.{/n} « {name}. M'accorderez-vous votre permission ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's barely audible footsteps seem to drown out all other sounds on the bridge. Officers break away from their tasks and cast fearful and hateful glances in his direction. Marazhai seems to be revelling in the outpouring of hostile attention, a satisfied smile playing on his lips. But when he glances at you, he drops to one knee and bows his head submissively.{/n} "{name}. I seek your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les pas quasiment inaudibles de Marazhai semblent pourtant étouffer tous les autres sons qui résonnent habituellement sur le pont. Les officiers s'interrompent dans leur travail et lui lancent des regards où se mêlent terreur et haine. Marazhai semble se délecter de leur hostilité et affiche un sourire satisfait, mais quand il vous aperçoit, il met un genou à terre et s'incline avec déférence.{/n} « {name}. M'accorderez-vous votre permission ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais kaum hörbare Schritte scheinen alle anderen Geräusche auf der Brücke zu übertönen. Die Offiziere lassen ab von ihren Aufgaben und schauen ängstlich und hasserfüllt in seine Richtung. Marazhai scheint den Schwall der feindseligen Aufmerksamkeit mit einem zufriedenen Schmunzeln in den Mundwinkeln zu genießen. Aber als er dich erblickt, fällt er auf die Knie und beugt unterwürfig seinen Kopf.{/n} "{name}. Ich erbitte Eure Erlaubnis."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's barely audible footsteps seem to drown out all other sounds on the bridge. Officers break away from their tasks and cast fearful and hateful glances in his direction. Marazhai seems to be revelling in the outpouring of hostile attention, a satisfied smile playing on his lips. But when he glances at you, he drops to one knee and bows his head submissively.{/n} "{name}. I seek your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais kaum hörbare Schritte scheinen alle anderen Geräusche auf der Brücke zu übertönen. Die Offiziere lassen ab von ihren Aufgaben und schauen ängstlich und hasserfüllt in seine Richtung. Marazhai scheint den Schwall der feindseligen Aufmerksamkeit mit einem zufriedenen Schmunzeln in den Mundwinkeln zu genießen. Aber als er dich erblickt, fällt er auf die Knie und beugt unterwürfig seinen Kopf.{/n} "{name}. Ich erbitte Eure Erlaubnis."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}かろうじて聞き取れるマラズハイ足音が、ブリッジの他のすべての音をかき消したように思えた。士官たちは仕事から離れ、恐怖と憎悪のまなざしを彼へと投げている。マラズハイは敵意のまなざしを一身に受け、満足げな笑みを浮かべている。しかしあなたを見ると、片膝をついて従順に頭を下げた。{/n}「{name}、許可をくれないか」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's barely audible footsteps seem to drown out all other sounds on the bridge. Officers break away from their tasks and cast fearful and hateful glances in his direction. Marazhai seems to be revelling in the outpouring of hostile attention, a satisfied smile playing on his lips. But when he glances at you, he drops to one knee and bows his head submissively.{/n} "{name}. I seek your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}かろうじて聞き取れるマラズハイ足音が、ブリッジの他のすべての音をかき消したように思えた。士官たちは仕事から離れ、恐怖と憎悪のまなざしを彼へと投げている。マラズハイは敵意のまなざしを一身に受け、満足げな笑みを浮かべている。しかしあなたを見ると、片膝をついて従順に頭を下げた。{/n}「{name}、許可をくれないか」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın zar zor seçilen ayak sesleri, kulağa köprüdeki diğer tüm sesleri bastırıyormuş gibi geliyor. Subaylar, görevlerinden uzaklaşarak geldiği yöne korku ve nefret dolu bakışlarını çeviriyor. Marazhai, dışa vurulan tüm bu düşmanca ilgiden keyif alıyor gibi duruyor. Tatmin olmuş bir gülümseme, dudaklarını ele geçiriyor. Seni gördüğündeyse tek dizinin üzerine çöküp itaatkârca başını eğiyor.{/n} "{name}. İznini istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's barely audible footsteps seem to drown out all other sounds on the bridge. Officers break away from their tasks and cast fearful and hateful glances in his direction. Marazhai seems to be revelling in the outpouring of hostile attention, a satisfied smile playing on his lips. But when he glances at you, he drops to one knee and bows his head submissively.{/n} "{name}. I seek your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın zar zor seçilen ayak sesleri, kulağa köprüdeki diğer tüm sesleri bastırıyor gibi geliyor. Subaylar, görevlerinden uzaklaşarak geldiği yöne korku ve nefret dolu bakışlarını çeviriyorlar. Marazhai, dışa vurulan tüm bu düşmanca ilgiden keyif alıyor gibi duruyor. Tatmin olmuş bir gülümseme dudaklarını ele geçiriyor. Seni gördüğündeyse tek dizinin üzerine çöküp itaatkâr bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n} "{name}. İznini istiyorum."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
